title: Senior Engineer
summary: Transferred to the International Power Trading Division, focusing on developing power trading strategies for Japan and Australia markets. Developing spread strategy models to predict spot market electricity prices and assist traders in decision-making.

Support traders with data-driven decision-making tools

achievements: Developed spot market prediction model for electronic trading strategies

title: Senior Engineer
summary: Developed solar power prediction and display systems, optimized power matching algorithms, and integrated various platforms with advanced authentication systems.

Integrated optimized algorithms into power matching platform backend using Django REST APIs
Implemented asynchronous computing with token system and email notifications for better UX
Developed third-party login (SSO) functionality integrating Microsoft Azure AD and Google login
achievements: Successfully deployed solar power prediction system for demonstration site
Improved algorithm efficiency by 25% through optimization
Enhanced platform security and user experience with SSO integration
